participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, with a keen interest in sports and activities that challenge her.
participant_1.background: I have flown out of the country. I love hockey. I studied business as my major. My befriend is from out of town. I have a younger sibling.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and creative, with a passion for performing and a love for animals.
participant_2.background: I like going to the movies. I work in a circus as a juggler. I am on a keto diet. I have 2 dogs, both golden retrievers. My father and grandfather also worked in the circus.

content.text: Good! I'm a juggler in a circus.
That's so cool! What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the adrenaline rush of performing and the challenge of learning new tricks.
That makes sense. I've always wanted to learn how to juggle but I'm not very coordinated.
It's not as hard as it looks! You should give it a try.
I might just do that. What else do you like to do?
I love going to the movies, I'm on a keto diet, and I have two golden retrievers.
I love going to the movies too! I'm not sure what a keto diet is though.
It's a low-carb, high-fat diet. It's helped me lose weight and feel better.
That's great! I'm glad it's working for you.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love playing hockey, I studied business as my major, and I have a younger sibling.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to play hockey but I'm not very good.
It's not that hard to get started. You should give it a try!
I might just do that. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
